title: Anne's Legacy
creator_credit: Dulcie Cedaro, Legacy and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Encouraged by her daughter, Anne, to get out there and keep busy, Dulcie started to volunteer. Through the volunteer work, Dulcie remembered her time at Legacy when she was 12 and decided to join up again. This restored her quality of life and brought her back in contact with the community that would provide support after Anne died.
